citation.article-title: Naxibacter varians sp. nov. and Naxibacter haematophilus sp. nov., and emended description of the genus Naxibacter.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus NaxibacterXu et al. 2005
The description is that of Xu et al. (2005), with the exception that the polar lipid profile does not contain phosphatidylinositol mannosides.
Another lipid present in major amounts is diphosphatidylglycerol.
The polyamine pattern contains the predominant compounds 2-hydroxyputrescine and putrescine.
